practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
Throughout Albany, Oregon, and the Tri-County area of Washington, the law firm of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys represents those who need legal help regarding issues of bankruptcy, personal injury, motor vehicle accidents, wrongful death, trucking accidents, and brain and birth injuries. Our attorneys have over 30 years of experience working with clients to resolve debt and file for bankruptcy. Individuals and businesses can testify to our ability to find a customized solution that works for each individual situation.

We take pride in being available seven days a week because we know our clients require help that extends past regular working hours. For matters of debt and financial strain, the pressure is constant, and we want to be there to provide advice and encouragement whenever it is needed. Those who need legal counsel related to Chapter 7, Chapter 13, Chapter 11 and Chapter 12 bankruptcies rely on us for successful resolution. We also handle matters of credit harassment for those who are under pressure from mortgage companies, credit-reporting agencies, credit unions, collection agencies and banks.

At the law firm of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys, we also understand how a personal injury can completely change the quality of life of our clients. We work to obtain adequate compensation for loss of income, medical expenses and repair charges for those who have suffered injuries at the hands of another.

Because we want legal help to be accessible to all citizens at any time, we are happy to take credit card payments. Those who have questions about their case or situation should schedule a free initial consultation with our law firm.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
